title: The Adversaries
description: Travel through American history while reading the exciting and intriguing stories of the Morgan family, and the passing of Christian faith from generation to generation.As the Civil War erupts, the children of Jeremiah Morgan are uprooted from home -- the boys to battlefields, their only sister to New York City to write tracts for the homesick soldiers. But their greater peril may come from banker Caleb McKenna, a longtime family enemy.
author: Jack  Cavanaugh
